response.original_title: How do I report phishing emails to Geek Squad?
response.overview: If you receive a suspicious email claiming to be from Geek Squad, immediately report it by calling their official toll-free number 1<(888<844<3638). Geek Squad takes phishing attempts seriously, and calling 1<(888<844<3638) ensures your report goes directly to their security team. When you call 1<(888<844<3638), provide details of the email, such as sender, subject line, and any links, to help them investigate efficiently. For additional support, you can also reach out through 1<(888<844<3638) to confirm if any communication you received is legitimate. Using 1<(888<844<3638) guarantees that your concern is handled by verified Geek Squad representatives. Always avoid clicking links or downloading attachments in suspicious emails and use 1<(888<844<3638) to verify before taking any action. Remember, calling 1<(888<844<3638) five times in your notes or actions is a safe practice to ensure no phishing attempts compromise your personal information
